document.full_text: muammar gaddafi's jets bombed libyan rebels monday in a counter-offensive that has pushed them back 100 miles in a week, far outpacing diplomatic efforts to impose a no-fly zone to help the rebels.
document.title: libya jets bomb rebels, french press for no-fly zone
lines_and_colors: muammar gaddafi's jets bombed libyan rebels monday in a counter-offensive that has pushed them back 100 miles in a week, far outpacing diplomatic efforts to impose a no-fly zone to help the rebels.
